sentence: Poulter’s chances were already slim after an opening loss at Austin Country Club and a 4 and 2 defeat to Ryder Cup team-mate Matt Fitzpatrick confirmed that he will miss the Masters for just the third time since his debut in 2004.
author: Phil Casey
title: Seamus Power set for Masters debut but misery for Ian Poulter and Paul Casey

sentence: In a repeat of last year’s final, Horschel will face Scottie Scheffler in the last 16 after the latter twice got the better of Matt Fitzpatrick, firstly winning their group five contest 5 and 4 to force a play-off and then making a birdie on the sixth extra hole to advance.
author: Phil Casey
title: Seamus Power books Masters debut despite defeat in final group game in Austin

sentence: Like I told him after, enjoy the hell out of how well you’re playing, man.” As easy as Scheffler seemed to make it look on Sunday, he wouldn’t have made it to the weekend had he not won a six-hole playoff over Matthew Fitzpatrick to escape the group stage.
author: Jon McCarthy
title: PGA TOUR: Scottie Scheffler wins match play, is new World No. 1 ... Third-place for Corey Conners ... Tiger sighting
